Best Guides, Best Destinations

With Guidest, discover the world like you've never seen it before ! Our amazing certified guides will show you wonders that you never thought could exist.

We are organising a contest to celebrate our brand new destination: Saint-Malo.
Leave us your email address and get a chance to win a free 1-day tour of Saint-Malo by one of our best local guides, for you and a friend (or significant other 😉).

To enter the contest, all you need to do enter you email at the top of the page, answer the following survey and keep your finger crossed. Easy!

Our Strategy

Incentive

Highlighting attractive content: Propose a guided tour of St Malo accompanied by a guide from the region. A rewarding moment in an idyllic setting. An immersive experience completely exotic!

Call to action: Put in place clear and bold CTAs highlighted with colors.

Advertisment / backlinks

Focus on quality over quantity.

Backlinks:

  • The domain names of the backlinks will have to be of quality
  • The variety of source domains for backlinks is important
  • All sources must have topics in common
  • Use the <a href> tag

Banner:

  • Respect the standard dimensions
  • Opt for a simple and readable design
  • Use the buttons appropriately
  • Create a well-defined framework
  • Be consistent with your brand
  • Only use images if they are needed
  • Create a sense of urgency
  • Choose appropriate colors that match and stand out from the partner site

Analytics & Followed KPIs

Facebook KPIs

  • Number of follower
  • Number of likes
  • Number of shares
  • Which reactions stand out the most
  • Rate of redirection towards the landing

Instagram KPIs

  • Number of followers
  • Number of likes
  • Number of tag and click on the bio link

CRM KPIs

  • Deliverability to see if our base is healthy
  • Mail opening rate
  • Click rate

SEO Strategy

The SEO strategy will begin during the construction of the site, define the titles, header with all the tags. Set short but long keywords for this to appear in google, yahoo, bing searches, such as:
"Saint Malo tour guide tour" "Saint malo discovery trip" "brittany tour discovery guide" etc.

It will be necessary to check beforehand the types of keywords which are the most relevant thanks to the google tools which make it possible to know if the words are often typed.

Here are the elements to optimize from the beginning:

  • The html code
  • The title tags
  • The meta description tag
  • The urls
  • The OpenGraph Protocol meta tags
  • The urls & their redirections
  • The charset

Design

Typography

Montserrat

This OpenSource font created by designer Julieta Ulanovsky is inspired by the traditional Buenos Aires neighborhood Montserrat. Mimicking the old posters and traffic signs of the region, this font is very readable and has profound roots in international travel. Each letter has character and each weight has it's own atmosphere like different streets in the same neighborhood.

Find Montserrat on Google Fonts

Colors

Our color scheme is inspired by the city of Saint-Malo. The city having such a strong relationship with the sea, we decided that variants of marine blue were the best way to symbolize it. We also wanted the visitors to be reminded of the blue skies and blue seas that we all equate to vacations and summer. The black & white supporting colors give a touch of purity and luxury to the page.

Social Media

The target

  • 25-34 years old
  • Accustomed to go on a trip / weekend
  • Need to disconnect, find nature
  • Looks at travel commercial offers

The goal

Develop a social media presence to generate traffic to the landing page.

Two main networks focused on the uses of our targets: Facebook and Instagram

How ?

With attractive content :

  • Videos
  • Pictures
  • CTAs to link our website

Media Planning Example

1. Reach

The first is a step is one of reach & wide diffusion. By targeting people with a focus on travel, this phase aims to generate traffic.

2. Retargetting

The second step is a retargeting phase where we again target the people who generated qualified visits on the landing page but did not answer the questionnaire. This is to optimize the response rate.
